decks.notes: This deck revolves around using instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance to bring powerful creatures like Griselbrand onto the battlefield quickly. The deck also focuses on recurring value through cards like Ephemerate and Fallaji Archaeologist. Additionally, it includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation to control the game. The creatures in the deck have abilities that synergize well with each other, allowing for explosive combos and overwhelming board presence. Overall, the deck aims to quickly reanimate and overpower the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on using cycling creatures like Street Wraith and Curator of Mysteries to fill the graveyard quickly, then casting Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield. The deck also includes ways to protect the combo with cards like Force of Negation and Subtlety, as well as card draw and filtering with cards like Shardless Agent and Ardent Plea. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a large board presence after casting Living End, utilizing the graveyard as a resource to take control of the game.

This deck focuses on generating mana quickly and efficiently through rituals and medallions to cast spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames. The goal is to storm off and combo out with cards like Grapeshot and Artist's Talent, while also utilizing Wish to search for specific combo pieces when needed. The deck includes cantrips like Manamorphose and Glimpse the Impossible to dig for key cards, with the ability to generate extra red mana through cards like Valakut Awakening and Strike It Rich. The deck aims to win the game quickly through explosive combos and synergies.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using creatures like Fallaji Archaeologist and Hydroelectric Specimen, along with spells like Tameshi, Reality Architect and Whir of Invention. The goal is to quickly set up a win condition with cards like Goblin Charbelcher while controlling the game with counterspells such as Disrupting Shoal and disruptive spells like Stern Scolding. The deck lacks traditional land cards, relying instead on mana rocks like Lotus Bloom and Suppression Ray to cast its spells efficiently. It aims to win through a unique strategy that overwhelms opponents before they can react.

The main focus of the deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures using cards like Street Wraith and Shardless Agent, and then cast Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield. Cards like Generous Ent and Windcaller Aven help cycle through the deck to find the combo pieces needed. The deck also includes cards like Force of Negation and Endurance to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Boseiju, Who Endures is included to ensure Living End resolves without being countered.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker to generate value and control the board. By ramping up with Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Stirrings, you can quickly get out threats like Emrakul, the Promised End. The key strategy is to utilize the various synergies between your cards, such as boosting your creatures with Blade of the Bloodchief and disrupting your opponent with Kozilek's Command. With the right setup, you can overwhelm your opponent and secure victory.

This Aggro - Death And Taxes deck focuses on aggressive creature play while disrupting the opponent's strategy. Utilizing cards like Fatal Push and Prismatic Ending to remove threats, while utilizing creature abilities like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp for tempo advantage. The deck also incorporates a strong mana base with fetch lands and color fixing lands to ensure consistency in playing its powerful creatures. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and disrupt their game plan while maintaining a solid board presence.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to play threats early and maintain pressure through combat and direct damage spells. The deck includes cards like Joshua, Phoenix's Dominant, Guide of Souls, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to push for damage, while also utilizing cards like Lightning, Army of One and Goblin Bombardment for additional reach. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and burn spells to secure victories.

The deck focuses on utilizing Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate mana to power out a Primeval Titan or Scapeshift combo to search for powerful lands like Vesuva, Lotus Field, and Tolaria West. By utilizing land bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber and Gruul Turf, as well as utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures or an instant win condition. The deck also includes tools like Aftermath Analyst and Spelunking to help dig for key combo pieces.
